scripts.copy-libs-src: mkdirp src/assets/dojo && cpx "node_modules/dojo/**/*" src/assets/dojo -u && mkdirp src/assets/dojox && cpx "node_modules/dojox/**/*" src/assets/dojox -u && mkdirp src/assets/dijit && cpx "node_modules/dijit/**/*" src/assets/dijit -u
scripts.clear-libs-src: rimraf src/assets/dojo && rimraf src/assets/dojox && rimraf src/assets/dijit
scripts.copy-libs-dist: mkdirp dist/browser/assets/dojo && cpx "node_modules/dojo/**/*" dist/browser/assets/dojo -u && mkdirp dist/browser/assets/dojox && cpx "node_modules/dojox/**/*" dist/browser/assets/dojox -u && mkdirp dist/browser/assets/dijit && cpx "node_modules/dijit/**/*" dist/browser/assets/dijit -u
scripts.build-file-select: ng build --prod file-select && cd dist/file-select && npm pack
scripts.build-jsdraw-wrapper: ng build --prod jsdraw-wrapper && cd dist/jsdraw-wrapper && npm pack
scripts.build-ketcher-wrapper: ng build --prod ketcher-wrapper && cd dist/ketcher-wrapper && npm pack
scripts.build-libraries: npm run build-file-select && npm run build-jsdraw-wrapper && npm run build-ketcher-wrapper
scripts.build-server: ng run gsrs-client:server && npm run webpack:server
scripts.start:abase:dev: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=abase.dev
scripts.start:abase:local: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=abase.local
scripts.start:abase:pre-prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=abase.pre-prod
scripts.start:abase:prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=abase.prod
scripts.start:fda:dev: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=fda.dev
scripts.start:fda:local: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=fda.local
scripts.start:fda:pre-prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=fda.pre-prod
scripts.start:fda:prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=fda.prod
scripts.start:gsrs:dev: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=gsrs.dev
scripts.start:gsrs:local: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=gsrs.local
scripts.start:gsrs:pre-prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=gsrs.pre-prod
scripts.start:gsrs:prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=gsrs.prod
scripts.start:inxight:dev: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=inxight.dev
scripts.start:inxight:local: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=inxight.local
scripts.start:inxight:pre-prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=inxight.pre-prod
scripts.start:inxight:prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run copy-libs-src && ng serve --aot=true --configuration=inxight.prod
scripts.build:abase:pre-prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run clear-libs-src && ng build --base-href=/ginas/app/beta/ --aot=true --configuration=abase.pre-prod && node process-index.js && npm run copy-libs-dist && npm run build-server
scripts.build:abase:prod: npm run build-libraries && npm run clear-libs-src && ng build --base-href=/ginas/app/beta/ --aot=true --configuration=abase.prod && node process-index.js && npm run copy-libs-dist && npm run build-server
